name: 1vgrex

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))

-| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2))

comment: A graph with at least one vertex is a set. (Contributed by AV, 2-Mar-2021.)
